main event: A possible UFO sighting observed at the USAF Academy in Colorado, reported to be moving at high speed and disappearing abruptly.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at Mach 2,The observer was a reliable source from the Department of Astronautics,The sighting occurred during clear conditions with no moonlight present,The object showed uniform light intensity throughout the observation,Possibility of the object being an aircraft, astronomical phenomenon, or reentry was considered.
witness description: S/A CPI R. Swaisla, a reliable observer from the USAF Academy's Department of Astronautics
